Title: SharePoint Ad Rotator
Description: SPAdRotator is a SharePoint Web Part that can randomly display images from a SharePoint library. Images can be displayed either one at a time (a new random image is selected every time the page is loaded), or all images can be displayed using a transition effect.
HomeWiki:
Project Description
SPAdRotator is a SharePoint Web Part that can randomly display images from a SharePoint library. Images can be displayed either one at a time (a new random image is selected every time the page is loaded), or all images can be displayed using a transition effect.

Live Demo

A live demo is available here.

Click on the Downloads tab to download the SharePoint solution.
